snippet.title: Vikingard | Trailer | Anniversary
snippet.description:
The Vikingard x Vikings Crossover Part Ⅱ is now live!
Celebrate Vikingard's one-year anniversary with an epic adventure featuring even more characters from MGM's hit TV series, Vikings, including the legendary Bjorn and fierce warrior Ubbe. Ragnar and other fan favorite characters from the first collaboration will be back.
With new challenges, events, and rewards, there's never been a better time to join the Vikingard community. Unleash your inner warrior and conquer the world of Vikings!
✨Follow us to get latest news:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Vikingardgame
